Indian Economy.title: Don’t worry about IMF’s poor rating of Indian statistics. Our economy has evolved faster than our statistical system
Indian Economy.summary: The IMF’s ‘C’ grade has revived suspicions that India’s blistering growth is too good to be true. But this isn’t about inflated numbers, it’s about our statistical apparatus falling behind changes in the economy. India might even be growing faster than the nu…

Indian Economy.title: In firing a policy bazooka to support growth, India’s central bank may have overlooked the consequences for its mandate
Indian Economy.summary: Governments have thrown caution to the wind for economic gains, giving up plans for safety measures to let AI firms watch themselves. Will the world re-awaken to AI’s dangers only after disaster strikes?

Indian Economy.title: From disbursal obsession to dignified collections: rethinking the credit value chain for India’s maturing economy
Indian Economy.summary: Test of credit ecosystem isn’t in how fast loans are handed out, but in how responsibly they come back

Indian Economy.title: A rate cut was actually needed
Indian Economy.summary: Buoyant growth numbers cannot hide the fact that both producers and consumers suffer from high real rates, which would still be above 3 per cent after the rate cut

Startups & Funding.title: Venture capital hunts for India’s next big consumer AI champion
Startups & Funding.summary: The growing success of consumer tech firms has led Indian VCs to invest in AI startups. Significant funding has been raised by companies like Dashverse and Kuku FM, indicating a burgeoning market for consumer AI across multiple sectors.

Banking & Finance.summary: Bank holidays next week: Banks are typically closed on regional holidays, national holidays and the weekends. While only certain parts of India observe bank holidays during the regional holidays, all banks remain closed during national observances.
